name: Doki Doki Shutter Chance
overview: Doki Doki Shutter Chance's plot is about a school photographer that his dream is about make a photograph of the beautiful girls of his school wearing a swimsuit. To make his dream come true he have to win the girls in a jigsaw puzzle game, only in that case he will photograh the girls Cute but really difficult jigsaw puzzle game in which you have to play against the computer or another player to see who is quicker in solve the jigsaw puzzle. The curious thing is that each opponent can use special attacks that they receive putting the right pieces in the board, the more pieces they put their special meter at the bottom will increase and new special will appear. The game features 3 game modes: - Story mode: Help our photograher through his adventure in collecting all the girls pictures. - VS Mode: Play against a computer opponent or another human player with all the game characters and choose the rules (show or hide the board lines, rotate or not rotate each piece. - Gallery mode: Watch the pictures that you can unlock in the main game.
